reasoning: This is a well-defined architectural migration from Pages Router to App Router with a major version upgrade (13.1.6 → 15.x). The scope is contained (~15 files), the codebase is small, and Next.js provides clear migration documentation. Research is needed for latest App Router patterns and third-party library compatibility (next-axiom, cookies-next), but no new integrations are being added.

scope.notes: 7 page routes, 2 API routes, 1 _app.tsx, next.config.mjs, and potentially several components need 'use client' directives. All pages touch the routing layer.

integrations.notes: No new integrations. Existing integrations (next-axiom, cookies-next) need App Router compatibility verification. API routes use existing services.

infrastructure.notes: next.config.mjs needs updates. i18n config mentioned as incompatible with App Router. Package.json dependencies need version updates.

knowledge.notes: Next.js provides migration guides, but need to research latest 15.x patterns for: layout.tsx structure, route handlers (replacing API routes), metadata API (replacing next/head), and client component boundaries.
